York has a diverse and exciting range of music societies available to you, we've put together a comprehensive list of what campus can offer budding musicians

Societies: Media and Publishing

The University of York is home to several multiple award winning media and publishing societies. It is regarded as one of the best campuses for journalism and this list will help you choose the right society for your media and publishing needs

The University of York has many active political societies, this guide details what campus has to offer for budding political activists
